Articles.Content:
So in this screenshot:

With the big arrow to the left, what is causing the shadow-pillar? Is it a setting I can disable?

Secondly, with the arrows to the right, what mod is each arrow assoiciated with? I can't figure out what they are for.

 

Thank you!

The lower of the red arrows to the right point to robotics tab, not sure bout top arrow. Uve obviously got a load of mods.

theres been reports of graphic spikes from parts that have been jettisoned, not sure if its fixed or if theres workaround.

as per sticky in forum for help - people need to see ur logs etc mate before they can help properly
The Shadow is a known sideffect of Scatterers Godrays, if this shadows bother you, you can uncheck this feature in the main menu
